fields.name: Assign Grades (Passive):
fields.value: As long as you are alive, only your vote counts during the evening phase; however, your score will be assigned as if all votes but your own count.

fields.name: Remediation (Charge 75%):
fields.value: Grant your target a 5% score boost if you can win together, or a 5% score deduction otherwise. These adjustments are doubled if you are Town-aligned. This ability cannot self-target.

fields.name: RateMyProfessor (Passive):
fields.value: If you score below 25% (if town) or below 40% (if not town), you die instantly.
